Text: Diana L. Eck:  Among other works, she is the author of "Banaras, City of Light", "Darsan: Seeing the Divine Image in India", "Encountering God: A Spiritual Journey from Bozeman to Banaras", and "A New Religious America: How a Christian Country Became the World's Most Religiously Diverse Nation".
